metadata.name: Catarase Pws 300units 2ml 270 FIP units Tablet delayed release

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used as a surfactant antistatic agent and biocide in cosmetic products A19426

contraindications.disease: Intravenous LD50 of 18mg kg reported for mice L796 Oral LD50 estimated to be 8 2g kg based on results with steapyrium chloride in rats due to the similarity in structre between steapyrium and lapyrium A19426
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Lapyrium is a quaternary ammonium cation QAC QACs exert broad spectrum antimicrobial activity acting as bactericidal agents A19427
